project_abstract.cdata: The project's major objectives are to assist in: (i) developing indigenous renewable energy resources, thus reducing dependence on imported oil; and (ii) strengthening the Borrower's financial management through the establishment of an improved accounting system and a comprehensive training program. Towards these ends, the project would include: (a) the construction of a concrete gravity dam across the Drina river; (b) the installation of three hydro turbine-generator units each of 105-MW, with inlet and outlet structures; (c) the construction of a 400-kV step-up transformer bank and a transmission line to connect the plant to the national power grid; (d) technical assistance in construction supervision; and (e) training in financial management.
